summary:
I found the vanilla archmage robes not being good enough for an archmage. This mod changes the stats to:
All spells cost 25% less to cast, adds 100 magicka to the wearer, 175% magicka regen.
descriptionHtml:
The vanilla archmage robes just aren\\\'t fit for an archmage. So i made this mod to make the stats better. It also changes the base price from 100 to 500. Here are the new stats:
All spells cost 25% less to cast, adds 100 magicka to the wearer, 175% magicka regen.
Hope you enjoy, this is my first mod, and thanks!
author: lllllBlader
